      • isAuthenticated

        public static boolean isAuthenticated(net.minecraft.server.network.ServerPlayerEntity player)
        Checks whether player is authenticated. Fake players always count as authenticated.
        Parameters:
        player - player that needs to be checked
        Returns:
        false if player is not authenticated, otherwise true

      • onInitializeServer

      • notAuthenticated

        public static net.minecraft.text.LiteralText notAuthenticated(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player)
        Gets the text which tells the player to login or register, depending on account status.
        Parameters:
        player - player who will get the message
        Returns:
        LiteralText with appropriate string (login or register)

      • authenticatePlayer

        public static void authenticatePlayer(net.minecraft.server.network.ServerPlayerEntity player,
                                      net.minecraft.text.Text msg)
        Authenticates player and sends the success message.
        Parameters:
        player - player that needs to be authenticated
        msg - message to be send to the player

      • deauthenticatePlayer

        public static void deauthenticatePlayer(net.minecraft.server.network.ServerPlayerEntity player)
        De-authenticates the player.
        Parameters:

      • isPlayerFake

        public static boolean isPlayerFake(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player)
        Checks whether player is a fake player (from CarpetMod).
        Parameters:
        player - player that needs to be checked
        Returns:
        true if player is fake, otherwise false

      • teleportPlayer

        public static void teleportPlayer(net.minecraft.server.network.ServerPlayerEntity player,
                                  boolean toSpawn)
        Teleports player to spawn or last location that is recorded. Last location means the location before de-authentication.
        Parameters:
        player - player that needs to be teleported
        toSpawn - whether to teleport player to spawn (provided in config) or last recorded position
